title: New header & new color
description:
Follow [this guide](https://github.com/Hider-alt/covid-widget/blob/v1/img/update.md) to update the widget

Changes:
- Added header for small size
- Added cyan color for stable cases trend
- You can now use country names with spaces (e.g. New Zealand)
- Improved text when new update is available
- Changed APIs
